aboutSection.title: Sobre mi
aboutSection.greeting: Hola! I am Carolina Celeste Navarro Aldoradin
aboutSection.description: Technician/future engineer from Peru, passionate about creating innovative solutions through technology. I enjoy exploring new technologies and improving my skills through continuous learning.
aboutSection.availability: Currently available for freelance and full-time hybrid and remote roles globally or on-site roles in Peru.

mentality.title: My Mentality
mentality.description: My professional growth has been guided by the idea that there is always a solution, even when it's not obvious. I come from a background where opportunities are not guaranteed, so I turned every challenge into a driving force. This mentality allowed me to pave my way through two careers, earn competitive scholarships, and advance in technical areas with steep learning curves. This same attitude is what I bring to every project: researching, testing, iterating, and not letting go of the problem until I find the answer.
mentality.quote: Aut viam inveniam aut faciam. - Hannibal Barca
mentality.translation: I will find a way or make one. - Hannibal Barca

discipline.title: Discipline
discipline.description: Discipline has been a cornerstone of my journey. Balancing rigorous academic pursuits with personal growth required unwavering commitment and time management. This discipline has empowered me to consistently meet deadlines, achieve goals, and maintain a high standard of work in all my endeavors.

projectsSection.title: My Projects
projectsSection.description: A tactical gallery of past work — click a card to inspect the full dossier

Portfolio.name: Portfolio Website
Portfolio.description: A personal portfolio website to showcase my projects and skills.
Portfolio.problem: I need to get hired but people don't know my work
Portfolio.challenge: Create a responsive and visually appealing portfolio website that highlights my work and expertise.
achievements: Successfully designed and developed a fully responsive portfolio website.
Implemented internationalization (i18n) to support multiple languages.
Deployed the website on Vercel for optimal performance and accessibility.
steps: Design the layout and structure of the portfolio website.
Develop the frontend using React and Next.js.
Implement internationalization (i18n) for multiple languages.
Deploy the website on Vercel for easy access.

senatiInnova.name: Acquisition and Visualization of Data from Mechatronic Module 4.0 with Augmented Reality
achievements: 11th place at National Level and 1st place at departmental level

RTLS.name: Real Time Localization System (RTLS)
RTLS.description: A RTLS system for tracking assets in real-time using BLE technology.
RTLS.challenge: Develop a reliable RTLS system that can accurately track the location of assets within a defined area.
achievements: Successfully implemented a BLE-based RTLS system.
Developed firmware for ESP32 devices to communicate with BLE beacons.
Created a Node-RED flow to process and visualize location data.
steps: Set up BLE beacons and receivers for asset tracking.
Develop firmware for ESP32 devices using C++ in VSCode.
Create a Node-RED flow to process and visualize location data.
Test and optimize the RTLS system for accuracy and reliability.

ReverseEngineering.name: Hydraulic Bench Reverse Engineering Process
ReverseEngineering.description: Project aimed to use telemetry and supervision to keep a history of the Hydraulic bench.
ReverseEngineering.problem: We have two hydraulic benches and both use legacy protocols and there is barely no documentation
ReverseEngineering.challenge: Reverse engineer the communication protocols used by the hydraulic bench to extract telemetry data.
steps: Capture communication data using Wireshark.
Analyze the captured data to identify protocols and data structures.
Develop Python scripts to extract and process telemetry data.
Implement a supervision system to monitor and log hydraulic bench performance.

LinealTransformers.name: Lineal Transformers
LinealTransformers.description: Web platform created to ease the learning of lineal transformers for engineering students in Math asignatures. Developed as Final project for the Discrete Mathematics Course.
LinealTransformers.challenge: Create an interactive web platform that simplifies the understanding of lineal transformers for engineering students.
achievements: Developed an interactive web platform with visualizations and examples.
Implemented user-friendly features to enhance the learning experience.
Received positive feedback from students and educators.
steps: Design the web platform layout and user interface.
Develop interactive features and visualizations using JavaScript.
Test the platform with engineering students and gather feedback.
Refine the platform based on user feedback to improve usability.

TinkuyhubJuntta.name: Tinkuyhub & Juntta Platforms Integration
TinkuyhubJuntta.description: HTTPS integration of Tinkuyhub & Juntta platforms to create an account for both Tinkuyhub and Juntta in Tinkuyhub website.
TinkuyhubJuntta.challenge: Reduce the friction in the signup process by integrating both platforms for a seamless user experience.
achievements: Successfully designed and developed an e-commerce platform.
Implemented secure payment processing and order management features.
Optimized the platform for performance and user experience.
steps: Design the e-commerce platform layout and user interface.
Develop frontend features using React.
Implement backend functionalities with Node.js, Express, and MongoDB.
Integrate secure payment processing and order management systems.

AIAvatar.name: AI Avatar Development
AIAvatar.description: Development of AI-driven avatars for interactive applications.
AIAvatar.challenge: Create realistic and responsive AI avatars that can interact with users in real-time.
achievements: Successfully developed AI avatars with natural language processing capabilities.
Implemented real-time interaction features for enhanced user engagement.
Deployed AI avatars in various interactive applications.
steps: Design the AI avatar models and interaction scenarios.
Develop natural language processing algorithms using Python and TensorFlow.
Implement real-time interaction features for user engagement.
Deploy AI avatars in interactive applications and gather user feedback.

servicesSection.title: Services
servicesSection.tagline: Offering a range of services to help you achieve your goals.
servicesSection.sideTitle: Lo que puedo hacer por ti
servicesSection.sideText: Brindo una variedad de servicios para satisfacer tus necesidades. Ya sea que busques consultoría experta, desarrollo web personalizado, diseño CAD detallado o soluciones innovadoras de avatares AI, tengo las habilidades y la experiencia para ofrecer resultados de alta calidad.
servicesSection.sideItem1: Consultoría experta en desarrollo de software y arquitectura de sistemas.
servicesSection.sideItem2: Desarrollo de aplicaciones web personalizadas adaptadas a las necesidades de tu negocio.
servicesSection.sideItem3: Creación y modificación de modelos CAD detallados para ingeniería y fabricación.
